items.title: 5. Download and read a CSV file

frontmatter.title: Visualising data on the web with Python and Dash
frontmatter.description: Dash is a user interface library for creating analytical web applications. Those who use Python for data analysis, data exploration, visualization, modelling, instrument control, and reporting will find immediate use for Dash.

frontmatter.title: Simple data visualisations have become key to communicating about the COVID-19 pandemic, but we know little about their impact.
Visualising high risk areas for Covid-19 mortality
